snippet: The San Francisco Giants won the title in 2010. The St. Louis Cardinals followed in 2011.  Now, one team must top the other for the right to return to the stage.
abstract: The San Francisco Giants won the title in 2010. The St. Louis Cardinals followed in 2011.  Now, one team must top the other for the right to return to the stage.

headline.main: N.L.C.S.: Past Two World Series Champions Duel for a Chance to Return
headline.print_headline: Past Two World Series Champions Duel for a Chance to Return
